replies.body:
I don't want blast cones removed.

Fuck these opinions that oppose me.


----------------------------------



Was this post a stupid idea?

--> Yes

No
**Upset because someone lived at 10hp after using a blast cone**

This always irks me! Haha, but they're using resources available to them.

I love the plants.

> [{quoted}](name=Pouting,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nVcbxrvT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-19T21:55:31.134+0000)
>
> **Upset because someone lived at 10hp after using a blast cone**

up-voted this reply for all those people uspet at people living at 10 hp from using blast cones
Please don't  post about SR balance on your Aram account dog.
Wow what an utterly stupid comment. As if I dont have other accounts I play SR on. What is your point exactly?

Your match history provides me with no usefully information to try to help you with. Id rather you comment on your main so I can tell if your serious or just shit posting. Currently I lean to the latter.
It proves absolutely nothing. Comment on the content of the post. You are just looking to hate on people. Go away and get a life.

Its not my intent to hate on people who have a frustration with the game or want to improve. On the topic of your opening post, I disagree with you because I like plants more then I liked the smite passives from last jungle because everybody can interact with them and  specifically on the topic of blast cones, they keep the jungle from being quite as punishing to low mobility champs giving them options to chase or escape. I also happen to like riot making large gameplay changes and taking risks as it keeps the game from getting to stagnate for me, so we may have a fundamental disagreement on what we want them to do as a company.

You did not really respond to the content of my post but I feel like you might misunderstand why I'm asking, I want to look over the kill and death maps to get more information on how your playing. Its not to get your Elo and then use that to discount your opinions. Your opening post, I want this gone fuck this gimmick does not provide me adequate information. Why do you want it gone, why do you feel its a gimmick. You have also not responded in this thread to any one but mine and the content of both was to be insulting. Moving on, We can agree to disagree on how we want the game to develop, you can ignore me, you can flame me, or we can discuss gameplay.

Tldr. Put more content and less anger into your posts if you want people to comment on content. Off topic I would appreciate it if you put a bit of effort into being nicer to folks.
I'd be fine with them if they didn't allow people to go over walls.
